en: [Letter] 1806 Dec. 23, Mount Ebenezer [to] Francis A. Ramsey, near Knoxville, Knox County, Tennessee / M[c]K[nitt] Ramsey

This is a letter to Francis A. Ramsey from his son McKnitt Ramsey, dated December 23, 1806. McKnitt is staying with his aunt and uncle. He writes that he could not be more content if he was at the family home, Swan Pond. McKnitt requests that his father send him a dictionary soon.

This is a letter to Francis A. Ramsey from his son McKnitt Ramsey, dated December 23, 1806. McKnitt is staying with his aunt and uncle. He writes that he could not be more content if he was at the family home, Swan Pond. McKnitt requests that his father send him a dictionary soon.
Ramsey, John McKnitt A. (John McKnitt Alexander), -1808

none: [Letter] 1806 Dec. 23, Mount Ebenezer [to] Francis A. Ramsey, near Knoxville, Knox County, Tennessee / M[c]K[nitt] Ramsey : page 1

body.value: Mount Ebenezer Decr December 23 1806 Hond Honored Sir I embrace another opportunity of writing to you and as writing is the only medium through which distant and absent friends can Participate or enjoy any satisfaction from each other I think I ought to write to you for your Satisfaction Sir I have had my health very well indeed since I came here and I am very well contented here at this place indeed Uncle Aunty & Cousins are very kind to me and when I have the good will of them It makes me feel as Contented here as if I was at swan pond Uncle says Cousin if you tired Studying you may take a little exercise to yourself

none: [Letter] 1806 Dec. 23, Mount Ebenezer [to] Francis A. Ramsey, near Knoxville, Knox County, Tennessee / M[c]K[nitt] Ramsey : page 2

body.value: if you choose it is to use your own pleasure. Aunty says (between meals) Cousin come and get a piece if you want it. Cousin Meba says Ill sweep the room Cousin. Cousin Rey says Cousin if there is any wood cut I will bring it up. this makes me very much in favour favor with Ebeneser . so I am contented and like to live here I am before Mr Parsons now but if I dont get a dictionary soon I am affraid afraid of being behind for a little while but if I get it soon then I am not affraid of being behind at all please to get me one do soon as possible Give My Kindest Respect to all at swan pond and believe me to be your Son who wishes you a happy New year I am yours affectionately AK Ramsey I would have wrote by Charles only he was in a hurry MK McKnitt Ramsey

none: [Letter] 1806 Dec. 23, Mount Ebenezer [to] Francis A. Ramsey, near Knoxville, Knox County, Tennessee / M[c]K[nitt] Ramsey : page 3

body.value: Col Decber December 23d 1806 Francis A Ramsey Near Knoxville Knox County Tennessee ___ far By William Uncle expects to be up thru out next week have my dictionary ready for him to bring down
